prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a massive, barrel-chested gray alien warrior, very tan skin tone, giant white horseshoe mustache, wearing a red and black Pride Trooper uniform
feature_prompt: extreme muscle definition, detailed skin pores and wrinkles, hyperrealistic texture on the white mustache, detailed suit fabric
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic texture, smooth skin, blurry mustache, flat lighting, low quality, human skin color
